Freezing Level: Starting close to freezing higher tops, also frost in some corries and glens. Lifting above freezing at all levels.
Above the summits; may lower close to highest slopes later.
Generally above the summits, although some slopes close to freezing point early in day. Frost many glens at dawn.
Terrain frozen from glens upward following very low minima. Only just lifting above zero lower slopes.

column5: -3C, but feeling closer to -16C in direct exposure to strongest winds.
-2C, but feeling closer to -14C at first in direct exposure to strongest winds.
-2C; little change of temperature with height, locally staying close to freezing lower slopes.
0 to 2C. Colder lower slopes below an inversion.
-1C, but very locally a degree or so above freezing.
